body: Indeed cold outside but warm inside
Would you rather die alone in a cold alleyway or live as a powerless tool for the parasites who abused you?
So you're saying its better off for her to be treated as a prostitute and continue living with her abusive family who sent her out to begin with as well the chance that shes pregnant?
This is the secret ending the government didn't want you to know
For the match girl, arguably a better ending cause in the origins she died of cold outside as everyone else inside is warm and happy
